baseRule.text: 若比丘尼。與比丘獨露處共立共語。波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 77

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。獨與一比丘露地共立共語。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 81

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼獨與苾芻在露處立者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 84
